name: BMIguru
0:
”Alexa, open bmi guru”
”Alexa, ask bmi guru for my bmi”
”Alexa, ask bmi guru for bmi”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: b. m. i. guru
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI). Supports both imperial and metric units.

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial 911.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
